Answer this Question This question is open with pending answers, but none have been accepted yet On the confirm code screen it says the Million Dollar pack requires an update to work which won't be available until sometime in April. So basically you'll be getting 2 DLC characters for free but not until they put them up for sale. The Honky Tonk Man doesn't require a pre-order. He will be free DLC for everybody but not until this update comes down. 4 years ago 0 0 starpenguin answered: I got the Million Dollar pre-order pack and downloaded it but I can't find the content in the game.
